items.sentence: Life's too short to worry about that kind of thing.
Tom realized that he could be making a big mistake.
Tom didn't realize that Mary was John's girlfriend.
I didn't realize that you didn't understand French.
I didn't realize that you were allergic to peanuts.
I've been working for this company for three years.
The driver stopped the bus and told Tom to get out.
Tom doesn't seem to care whether we do that or not.
Tom isn't the only one not invited to Mary's party.
If at first you don't succeed, try, try, try again.
